issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.foxnews.com/politics/house-judiciary-passes-resolution-to-hold-hunter-biden-in-contempt-of-congress-setting-up-full-floor-vote](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.foxnews.com%2Fpolitics%2Fhouse-judiciary-passes-resolution-to-hold-hunter-biden-in-contempt-of-congress-setting-up-full-floor-vote) ### Comment > I can only read articles on foxnews when disabling javascript. I can't find any filter which will allow me to read the articles. I have tried manually blocking the ad. This did remove the ad, but I could not read whole article. issue.title: www.zhihu.com

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.zhihu.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.zhihu.com) ### Comment > 无法在www.zhihu.com网站上正常运行，能够在其他网站上生效。 > 已经尝试过以下方法： > 1. 重置Adguard设置，完全重装Adguard。 > 2. 清空Safari浏览器缓存和Mac网络缓存 > 3. 关闭Adgurad尝试了其他过滤插件，其他插件能在www.zhihu.com上正常运行。 > 推测：某一次关闭了adguard之后，再次打开时，设置未能生效。我想知道，adguard是否在PC的其他位置中缓存了配置文件。 Username: `@MrStrangerYang` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/m0wsjkibco0kksscgkwkcg0wcgs448wc90c6il64oo.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nb4wx81khhwsg4o4sgo40ss0okgwgo8pbtuqtllh5c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.12.2.1415 release System version: | macOS Sonoma 14.1.2 Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
EasyList Userscripts: | disabled Other extensions used: | None

comment.body: Thank you for the update. The issues have been resolved after the version update.

issue.title: aniwave.to

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://aniwave.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faniwave.to) ### Comment > This happens when upon entering the site and tapping the ‘Go to Homepage’ button, it will open another site that is similar to the site itself. Though this happens at least once when you are not using the your device for hours and the issue will not reappear until tomorrow, but the fact that upon tapping the in-site button will open and send you to another site is very annoying. > > Is there any AdGuard filter that I should have enabled or is this a AdGuard filter that needs updating? > > Let me know when there is an update. Username: `@Ian Chen` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r1mqmi5j73ko8gw4gscsgosw08sow88eghmpfyzzbs.jpg?nc=1)
